trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There was one other sighting in Tucson on or around April 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were walking our dog about 7:40 pm when she noticed an object heading towards us. She at first thought it was the police helicopter but when I looked it did not have a white light. Instead, it appeared to be on fire with a red, orange and yellow glow. We stopped for 5 minutes to watch it as it approached. As it got closer (still a few miles away) we could see that the glow was pulsing those same colors. It made no noise as it moved. It then hovered and began to slowly ascend. As it did so, the object began to slowly fade and then vanished entirely.
Summary: Wife and I walking dog when noticed object coming towards us from south
